model

Class Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Continent

  • public class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
    Continent Class has the information about continents like the continent name,continent control value, continent color and index values of Continents All the countries that belong to a continent are stored in HashMap,where the key is the Country String and its value is corresponding Country Object.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Continent(java.lang.String p_continentId, int p_controlValue)
      Creates a Continent based on continentId and controlValue(used in editMap) Will be used when user defined continents are to be created.
      Continent(java.lang.String p_continentId, java.lang.String p_controlValue, java.lang.String p_continentColor)
      Creates a Continent object with the arguments passed This constructor will be used when loading .map files

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getContinentColor()
      Returns the color of the continent.

      Returns the name of the continent.

      Returns the Control Value of the continent.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,CountryDetails> getCountries()
      Returns the countries as HashMap that belong to this Continent
      int getInMapIndex()
      Returns the Index value for this continent when saved in ".map" file following domination's rules

      • Continent

        Continent(java.lang.String p_continentId,
          java.lang.String p_controlValue,
          java.lang.String p_continentColor)
        Creates a Continent object with the arguments passed This constructor will be used when loading .map files
        Parameters:
        p_continentId - Name of the continent
        p_controlValue - Control value for this continent
        p_continentColor - Color value of the continent

      • Continent

        Continent(java.lang.String p_continentId,
          int p_controlValue)
        Creates a Continent based on continentId and controlValue(used in editMap) Will be used when user defined continents are to be created.
        Parameters:
        p_continentId - Id of the continent
        p_controlValue - Control value for this continent
